💥 Mounjaro prices are up 170% and pharmacies are feeling it!

Here's what really changed 👇

From 1 September, Mounjaro's list price jumps by up to 170%.

But the real shock isn't just the cost. Pharmacies must now:

1️⃣ Pay the higher price upfront

2️⃣ File monthly rebate reports (splitting NHS vs private)

3️⃣ Wait for retrospective rebates — still unclear in detail

For independents running on tight margins, that's a cashflow crisis.

For patients, it risks confusion, delays, and unsafe online alternatives.

That's why within days, Titan PMR launched a custom reporting suite — now used by 1,000+ pharmacies to:

✔ Generate rebate data in minutes

✔ Stay compliant without drowning in admin

✔ Keep the focus on patients, not paperwork

When global shocks land in local pharmacy…

👉 Titan moves fast.

#pharmacy #mounjaro #pmrreimagined #TitanPMR

caption:
If you want to see the future of pharmacy ✨

you need to see what Jeet, Yamini and their team are building.

We joined them in Leeds. First for a meal at one of their favourite spots 🍴

Then for a tour of their hub and spoke operation where we visited the central warehouse and one of the spoke pharmacies powered by Titan P2P 🏭💊

We will not spoil the full story just yet 👀

But here is what we can say.

This team is proving how independents can scale safely, efficiently and without compromise.

Big thanks to Jeet, Yamini and the whole team for the hospitality, the curry and the glimpse of what is possible with Titan 🙏

#TheTitanWay #TitanPMR #hubandspoke #automation #efficiency #pharmacyinnovation #digitisation

Can you spot the difference?

The GTIN doesn't.

Right now in UK pharmacy, different medicines are arriving with the same GTIN barcode or a GTIN that does not match the product inside.

When that happens, the scanner passes the wrong medicine as correct. Every safety layer collapses.

Pharmacists are forced to slow down, override the check, and carry the risk that should sit with manufacturers and regulators.

This is not a workflow problem. It is a patient safety problem.

The fix is simple:
• Make accurate GTIN barcodes mandatory
• Treat incorrect GTINs as labelling errors
• Protect the final safety check that keeps patients safe

If you work in pharmacy, please add your name.
This is a small action that protects every dispenser in the country.

👉 Sign the petition: bit.ly/3XNxapM

#EveryPackCounts #PharmacySafety #GTIN #CommunityPharmacy #TitanPMR
